1: כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>If</n> יִהְיֶ֥ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>is a</n> רִיב֙ <sup>7379 </sup> <n>If there be a controversy</n> בֵּ֣ין <sup>996 </sup> <n>between</n> אֲנָשִׁ֔ים <sup>582 </sup> <n>between men</n> וְנִגְּשׁ֥וּ <sup>5066 </sup> <n>and they come</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> הַמִּשְׁפָּ֖ט <sup>4941 </sup> <n>unto judgment</n> וּשְׁפָט֑וּם <sup>8199 </sup> <n>that [the judges] may judge</n> וְהִצְדִּ֙יקוּ֙ <sup>6663 </sup> <n>them then they shall justify</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַצַּדִּ֔יק <sup>6662 </sup> <n>the righteous</n> וְהִרְשִׁ֖יעוּ <sup>7561 </sup> <n>and condemn</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הָרָשָֽׁע׃ <sup>7563 </sup> <n>the wicked</n>
2: וְהָיָ֛ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> אִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>shall be if</n> בִּ֥ן <sup>1121 </sup> <n>[be] worthy</n> הַכּ֖וֹת <sup>5221 </sup> <n>to be beaten</n> הָרָשָׁ֑ע <sup>7563 </sup> <n>And it shall be if the wicked man</n> וְהִפִּיל֤וֹ <sup>5307 </sup> <n>shall cause him to lie down</n> הַשֹּׁפֵט֙ <sup>8199 </sup> <n>that the judge</n> וְהִכָּ֣הוּ <sup>5221 </sup> <n>and to be beaten</n> לְפָנָ֔יו <sup>6440 </sup> <n>before his face</n> כְּדֵ֥י <sup>1767 </sup> <n>according</n> רִשְׁעָת֖וֹ <sup>7564 </sup> <n>to his fault</n> בְּמִסְפָּֽר׃ <sup>4557 </sup> <n>by a certain number</n>
3: אַרְבָּעִ֥ים <sup>705 </sup> <n>Forty</n> יַכֶּ֖נּוּ <sup>5221 </sup> <n>stripes</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>no</n> יֹסִ֑יף <sup>3254 </sup> <n>he may give him [and] not exceed</n> פֶּן־ <sup>6435 </sup> <n>so</n> יֹסִ֨יף <sup>3254 </sup> <n>lest [if] he should exceed</n> לְהַכֹּת֤וֹ <sup>5221 </sup> <n>and beat</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>than</n> אֵ֙לֶּה֙ <sup>428 </sup> <n>these</n> מַכָּ֣ה <sup>4347 </sup> <n>stripes</n> רַבָּ֔ה <sup>7227 </sup> <n>him above these with many</n> וְנִקְלָ֥ה <sup>7034 </sup> <n>degraded</n> אָחִ֖יךָ <sup>251 </sup> <n>then thy brother</n> לְעֵינֶֽיךָ׃ <sup>5869 </sup> <n>your eyes</n> ס
4: לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>shall not</n> תַחְסֹ֥ם <sup>2629 </sup> <n>Thou shalt not muzzle</n> שׁ֖וֹר <sup>7794 </sup> <n>the ox</n> בְּדִישֽׁוֹ׃ <sup>1758 </sup> <n>is threshing</n> ס
5: כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>When</n> יֵשְׁב֨וּ <sup>3427 </sup> <n>dwell</n> אַחִ֜ים <sup>251 </sup> <n>If brethren</n> יַחְדָּ֗ו <sup>3162 </sup> <n>together</n> וּמֵ֨ת <sup>4191 </sup> <n>of them die</n> אַחַ֤ד <sup>259 </sup> <n>and one</n> מֵהֶם֙ <sup>1992 </sup> <n>like</n> וּבֵ֣ן <sup>1121 </sup> <n>and have no child</n> אֵֽין־ <sup>369 </sup> <n>and has</n> ל֔וֹ לֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> תִהְיֶ֧ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> אֵֽשֶׁת־ <sup>802 </sup> <n>the wife</n> הַמֵּ֛ת <sup>4191 </sup> <n>of the dead</n> הַח֖וּצָה <sup>2351 </sup> <n>shall not marry without</n> לְאִ֣ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>man</n> זָ֑ר <sup>2114 </sup> <n>A strange</n> יְבָמָהּ֙ <sup>2993 </sup> <n>her husband's brother</n> יָבֹ֣א <sup>935 </sup> <n>shall go in</n> עָלֶ֔יהָ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>in</n> וּלְקָחָ֥הּ <sup>3947 </sup> <n>unto her and take</n> ל֛וֹ לְאִשָּׁ֖ה <sup>802 </sup> <n>her to him to wife</n> וְיִבְּמָֽהּ׃ <sup>2992 </sup> <n>and perform the duty of an husband's brother</n>
6: וְהָיָ֗ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>shall be that</n> הַבְּכוֹר֙ <sup>1060 </sup> <n>And it shall be [that] the firstborn</n> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>whom</n> תֵּלֵ֔ד <sup>3205 </sup> <n>which she beareth</n> יָק֕וּם <sup>6965 </sup> <n>shall succeed</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> שֵׁ֥ם <sup>8034 </sup> <n>in the name</n> אָחִ֖יו <sup>251 </sup> <n>of his brother</n> הַמֵּ֑ת <sup>4191 </sup> <n>[which is] dead</n> וְלֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> יִמָּחֶ֥ה <sup>4229 </sup> <n>be not put out</n> שְׁמ֖וֹ <sup>8034 </sup> <n>that his name</n> מִיִּשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n>
7: וְאִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>if</n> לֹ֤א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>does not</n> יַחְפֹּץ֙ <sup>2654 </sup> <n>like</n> הָאִ֔ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>And if the man</n> לָקַ֖חַת <sup>3947 </sup> <n>not to take</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> יְבִמְתּ֑וֹ <sup>2994 </sup> <n>his brother's wife</n> וְעָלְתָה֩ <sup>5927 </sup> <n>go up</n> יְבִמְתּ֨וֹ <sup>2994 </sup> <n>then let his brother's wife</n> הַשַּׁ֜עְרָה <sup>8179 </sup> <n>to the gate</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> הַזְּקֵנִ֗ים <sup>2205 </sup> <n>unto the elders</n> וְאָֽמְרָה֙ <sup>559 </sup> <n>and say</n> מֵאֵ֨ין <sup>3985 </sup> <n>refuseth</n> יְבָמִ֜י <sup>2993 </sup> <n>My husband's brother</n> לְהָקִ֨ים <sup>6965 </sup> <n>to raise up</n> לְאָחִ֥יו <sup>251 </sup> <n>unto his brother</n> שֵׁם֙ <sup>8034 </sup> <n>a name</n> בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>in Israel</n> לֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>is not</n> אָבָ֖ה <sup>14 </sup> <n>he will</n> יַבְּמִֽי׃ <sup>2992 </sup> <n>not perform the duty of my husband's brother</n>
8: וְקָֽרְאוּ־ <sup>7121 </sup> <n>shall call</n> ל֥וֹ זִקְנֵי־ <sup>2205 </sup> <n>Then the elders</n> עִיר֖וֹ <sup>5892 </sup> <n>of his city</n> וְדִבְּר֣וּ <sup>1696 </sup> <n>him and speak</n> אֵלָ֑יו <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> וְעָמַ֣ד <sup>5975 </sup> <n>unto him and [if] he stand</n> וְאָמַ֔ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>[to it] and say</n> לֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> חָפַ֖צְתִּי <sup>2654 </sup> <n>I like</n> לְקַחְתָּֽהּ׃ <sup>3947 </sup> <n>not to take</n>
9: וְנִגְּשָׁ֨ה <sup>5066 </sup> <n>come</n> יְבִמְתּ֣וֹ <sup>2994 </sup> <n>Then shall his brother's wife</n> אֵלָיו֮ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to him</n> לְעֵינֵ֣י <sup>5869 </sup> <n>unto him in the presence</n> הַזְּקֵנִים֒ <sup>2205 </sup> <n>of the elders</n> וְחָלְצָ֤ה <sup>2502 </sup> <n>and loose</n> נַעֲלוֹ֙ <sup>5275 </sup> <n>his shoe</n> מֵעַ֣ל <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> רַגְל֔וֹ <sup>7272 </sup> <n>from off his foot</n> וְיָרְקָ֖ה <sup>3417 </sup> <n>and spit</n> בְּפָנָ֑יו <sup>6440 </sup> <n>in his face</n> וְעָֽנְתָה֙ <sup>6030 </sup> <n>and shall answer</n> וְאָ֣מְרָ֔ה <sup>559 </sup> <n>and say</n> כָּ֚כָה <sup>3602 </sup> <n>Thus</n> יֵעָשֶׂ֣ה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>So shall it be done</n> לָאִ֔ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>unto that man</n> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>who</n> לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>does not</n> יִבְנֶ֖ה <sup>1129 </sup> <n>that will not build up</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> בֵּ֥ית <sup>1004 </sup> <n>house</n> אָחִֽיו׃ <sup>251 </sup> <n>his brother's</n>
10: וְנִקְרָ֥א <sup>7121 </sup> <n>shall be called</n> שְׁמ֖וֹ <sup>8034 </sup> <n>And his name</n> בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>in Israel</n> בֵּ֖ית <sup>1004 </sup> <n>The house</n> חֲל֥וּץ <sup>2502 </sup> <n>loosed</n> הַנָּֽעַל׃ <sup>5275 </sup> <n>of him that hath his shoe</n> ס
11: כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>If</n> יִנָּצ֨וּ <sup>5327 </sup> <n>strive</n> אֲנָשִׁ֤ים <sup>376 </sup> <n>her husband</n> יַחְדָּו֙ <sup>3162 </sup> <n>together</n> אִ֣ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>A man</n> וְאָחִ֔יו <sup>251 </sup> <n>and his countryman</n> וְקָֽרְבָה֙ <sup>7126 </sup> <n>draweth near</n> אֵ֣שֶׁת <sup>802 </sup> <n>and the wife</n> הָֽאֶחָ֔ד <sup>259 </sup> <n>of the one</n> לְהַצִּ֥יל <sup>5337 </sup> <n>for to deliver</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> אִישָׁ֖הּ <sup>376 </sup> <n>her husband</n> מִיַּ֣ד <sup>3027 </sup> <n>out of the hand</n> מַכֵּ֑הוּ <sup>5221 </sup> <n>of him that smiteth</n> וְשָׁלְחָ֣ה <sup>7971 </sup> <n>him and putteth forth</n> יָדָ֔הּ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>her hand</n> וְהֶחֱזִ֖יקָה <sup>2388 </sup> <n>and taketh</n> בִּמְבֻשָֽׁיו׃ <sup>4016 </sup> <n>him by the secrets</n>
12: וְקַצֹּתָ֖ה <sup>7112 </sup> <n>Then thou shalt cut off</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> כַּפָּ֑הּ <sup>3709 </sup> <n>her hand</n> לֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>shall not</n> תָח֖וֹס <sup>2347 </sup> <n>shall not pity</n> עֵינֶֽךָ׃ <sup>5869 </sup> <n>thine eye</n> ס
13: לֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>shall not</n> יִהְיֶ֥ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>have</n> לְךָ֛ בְּכִֽיסְךָ֖ <sup>3599 </sup> <n>Thou shalt not have in thy bag</n> אֶ֣בֶן <sup>68 </sup> <n>differing</n> וָאָ֑בֶן <sup>68 </sup> <n>weights</n> גְּדוֹלָ֖ה <sup>1419 </sup> <n>a great</n> וּקְטַנָּֽה׃ <sup>6996 </sup> <n>and a small</n> ס
14: לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>shall not</n> יִהְיֶ֥ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>have</n> לְךָ֛ בְּבֵיתְךָ֖ <sup>1004 </sup> <n>Thou shalt not have in thine house</n> אֵיפָ֣ה <sup>374 </sup> <n>differing</n> וְאֵיפָ֑ה <sup>374 </sup> <n>measures</n> גְּדוֹלָ֖ה <sup>1419 </sup> <n>a great</n> וּקְטַנָּֽה׃ <sup>6996 </sup> <n>and a small</n>
15: אֶ֣בֶן <sup>68 </sup> <n>weight</n> שְׁלֵמָ֤ה <sup>8003 </sup> <n>[But] thou shalt have a perfect</n> וָצֶ֙דֶק֙ <sup>6664 </sup> <n>and just</n> יִֽהְיֶה־ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>shall have</n> לָּ֔ךְ אֵיפָ֧ה <sup>374 </sup> <n>measure</n> שְׁלֵמָ֛ה <sup>8003 </sup> <n>a perfect</n> וָצֶ֖דֶק <sup>6664 </sup> <n>and just</n> יִֽהְיֶה־ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>shall have</n> לָּ֑ךְ לְמַ֙עַן֙ <sup>4616 </sup> <n>because of</n> יַאֲרִ֣יכוּ <sup>748 </sup> <n>may be lengthened</n> יָמֶ֔יךָ <sup>3117 </sup> <n>shalt thou have that thy days</n> עַ֚ל <sup>5921 </sup> <n>in</n> הָֽאֲדָמָ֔ה <sup>127 </sup> <n>in the land</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> יְהוָ֥ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>which the LORD</n> אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <sup>430 </sup> <n>thy God</n> נֹתֵ֥ן <sup>5414 </sup> <n>giveth</n> לָֽךְ׃
16: כִּ֧י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> תוֹעֲבַ֛ת <sup>8441 </sup> <n>[are] an abomination</n> יְהוָ֥ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>unto the LORD</n> אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <sup>430 </sup> <n>thy God</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>everyone</n> עֹ֣שֵׂה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>For all that do</n> אֵ֑לֶּה <sup>428 </sup> <n>such things</n> כֹּ֖ל <sup>3605 </sup> <n>everyone</n> עֹ֥שֵׂה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>[and] all that do</n> עָֽוֶל׃ <sup>5766 </sup> <n>unrighteously</n> פ
17: זָכ֕וֹר <sup>2142 </sup> <n>Remember</n> אֵ֛ת <sup>853 </sup> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>what</n> עָשָׂ֥ה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>did</n> לְךָ֖ עֲמָלֵ֑ק <sup>6002 </sup> <n>what Amalek</n> בַּדֶּ֖רֶךְ <sup>1870 </sup> <n>unto thee by the way</n> בְּצֵאתְכֶ֥ם <sup>3318 </sup> <n>when ye were come forth</n> מִמִּצְרָֽיִם׃ <sup>4714 </sup> <n>out of Egypt</n>
18: אֲשֶׁ֨ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>how</n> קָֽרְךָ֜ <sup>7136 </sup> <n>How he met</n> בַּדֶּ֗רֶךְ <sup>1870 </sup> <n>thee by the way</n> וַיְזַנֵּ֤ב <sup>2179 </sup> <n>and smote the hindmost</n> בְּךָ֙ כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> הַנֶּחֱשָׁלִ֣ים <sup>2826 </sup> <n>of thee [even] all [that were] feeble</n> אַֽחַרֶ֔יךָ <sup>310 </sup> <n>behind</n> וְאַתָּ֖ה <sup>859 </sup> <n>you</n> עָיֵ֣ף <sup>5889 </sup> <n>thee when thou [wast] faint</n> וְיָגֵ֑עַ <sup>3023 </sup> <n>and weary</n> וְלֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>and he</n> יָרֵ֖א <sup>3373 </sup> <n>and he feared</n> אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <sup>430 </sup> <n>not God</n>
19: וְהָיָ֡ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>shall come</n> בְּהָנִ֣יחַ <sup>5117 </sup> <n>hath given thee rest</n> יְהוָ֣ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>Therefore it shall be when the LORD</n> אֱלֹהֶ֣יךָ ׀ <sup>430 </sup> <n>thy God</n> לְ֠ךָ מִכָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> אֹ֨יְבֶ֜יךָ <sup>341 </sup> <n>from all thine enemies</n> מִסָּבִ֗יב <sup>5439 </sup> <n>round about</n> בָּאָ֙רֶץ֙ <sup>776 </sup> <n>in the land</n> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> יְהוָֽה־ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>which the LORD</n> אֱ֠לֹהֶיךָ <sup>430 </sup> <n>thy God</n> נֹתֵ֨ן <sup>5414 </sup> <n>giveth</n> לְךָ֤ נַחֲלָה֙ <sup>5159 </sup> <n>thee [for] an inheritance</n> לְרִשְׁתָּ֔הּ <sup>3423 </sup> <n>to possess</n> תִּמְחֶה֙ <sup>4229 </sup> <n>it [that] thou shalt blot out</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> זֵ֣כֶר <sup>2143 </sup> <n>the remembrance</n> עֲמָלֵ֔ק <sup>6002 </sup> <n>of Amalek</n> מִתַּ֖חַת <sup>8478 </sup> <n>under</n> הַשָּׁמָ֑יִם <sup>8064 </sup> <n>from under heaven</n> לֹ֖א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>must not</n> תִּשְׁכָּֽח׃ <sup>7911 </sup> <n>thou shalt not forget</n> פ
